mapper.insert: INSERT INTO travel_schedule (m_idx, m_email, m_nickname, period_start, period_end, title) VALUES (#{m_idx}, #{m_email}, #{m_nickname}, #{period_start}, #{period_end}, #{title})
INSERT INTO schedule (post_id, day_number, city_name, label_number, place_name, place_address) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{day_number}, #{city_name}, #{label_number}, #{place_name}, #{place_address})
mapper.select: SELECT ts.m_idx AS m_idx, ts.post_id AS post_id, ts.m_email AS m_email, ts.m_nickname AS m_nickname, ts.period_start AS period_start, ts.period_end AS period_end, ts.title AS title, MAX(s.city_name) AS city_name, MAX(s.place_name) AS place_name, MAX(s.place_address) AS place_address FROM travel_schedule ts JOIN schedule s ON ts.post_id = s.post_id WHERE s.label_number = 1 GROUP BY ts.post_id

SELECT ts.m_idx, ts.post_id, ts.m_email, ts.m_nickname, ts.period_start, ts.period_end, ts.title, s.day_number, s.city_name, s.label_number, s.place_name, s.place_address FROM travel_schedule ts JOIN schedule s ON ts.post_id = s.post_id WHERE ts.post_id = #{post_id}
SELECT s_idx, post_id, day_number, city_name, label_number, place_name, place_address FROM schedule WHERE post_id = #{post_id}
